name: Gravitation
summary: game about mania, melancholia, and the creative process
description: Gravitation is a short, autobiographical pixelated art game by Jason Rohrer. It is a followup to his previous game, "Passage". It can be explored in approximately 8 minutes. If in doubt, please keep playing. If you still don't understand the game, please read the game creators statement on the website and the experiences of other people linked from the website.
